description: Plain-language real-life scenarios intended for mapping to Indian Penal Code offences.

scenarios.scenario: A person takes money from another by promising a government job but never provides the job.
A person intentionally causes the death of another using a weapon.
A person secretly takes someone else’s mobile phone without permission.
A person entrusted with company funds transfers the money to their personal account.
A person threatens to publish private photos unless money is paid.
A person files a false police complaint to harass a neighbour.
A person damages another person’s car during an argument.
A person enters a locked house without permission at night.
A person spreads false information online to harm someone’s reputation.
A person forges another person’s signature to withdraw money from a bank.
A person intentionally sets fire to a shop causing property damage.
A person kidnaps a child for ransom.
A person obstructs a public servant from performing official duties.
A person deliberately gives false evidence in a court proceeding.
A person assaults another during a dispute causing physical injury.
